title: Setup GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline
description: Create .github/workflows/ci.yml to run tests, linting, and build on push/PR. Include coverage reporting and artifact publishing.

title: Code Quality & Developer Experience Epic
description: Improve code quality, linting, formatting, and developer tooling to ensure maintainability and consistency across the codebase.

title: Add pre-commit hooks with husky
description: Install husky and lint-staged to run linting and formatting on commit. Prevents committing code that doesn't meet quality standards.

title: Add compact/comfortable view modes
description: Toggle between compact (minimal card height) and comfortable (full details visible) display modes. Save preference to workspace state.

title: Debounce file watcher refreshes
description: File watcher triggers multiple refreshes on rapid DB changes. Add debouncing (e.g., 300ms) to batch refresh calls.

title: Add time tracking visualization
description: Display estimated vs actual time. Show progress bars on cards. Add time logging capability with start/stop timer.

title: Implement CSP violation reporting
description: Add report-uri or report-to directive to CSP headers. Log CSP violations to output channel for debugging.

title: Increase test coverage to 80%+
description: Expand unit tests for beadsAdapter, extension, and webview modules. Focus on edge cases and error handling. Use c8 coverage reporting.

title: Database Management Epic
description: Implement database migrations, backup/restore, integrity checks, and multi-database support.

title: Implement virtual scrolling for large issue lists
description: Add virtual scrolling to handle 1000+ issues efficiently. Use IntersectionObserver or library like react-window pattern in vanilla JS.

title: Add CONTRIBUTING.md guidelines
description: Create contribution guidelines including setup instructions, coding standards, PR process, and testing requirements.

title: UI/UX Improvements Epic
description: Enhance user interface, improve accessibility, add responsive design, and refine user experience.

title: Enhanced search: include description and comments
description: Extend search to query description, acceptance criteria, design notes, and comments. Show match highlights in results.

title: Implement git user name detection for comment author
description: Replace TODO in extension.ts:131. Use git config to get user.name or fall back to VS Code settings for comment author attribution.

title: Add column sorting options
description: Allow sorting cards within columns by: priority, updated date, created date, assignee, estimated time. Persist sort preference.

title: Add Prettier for code formatting
description: Install and configure Prettier with format-on-save integration. Add .prettierrc and .prettierignore files.

title: Create CHANGELOG.md
description: Add CHANGELOG.md following Keep a Changelog format. Document version history and changes for v0.0.1 through v0.0.3.

title: Install missing ESLint dependency
description: ESLint is listed in package.json devDependencies but 'npm run lint' fails. Install eslint package and verify lint script works.

title: Implement pagination for board view
description: Add pagination controls to load issues in batches (e.g., 50 per page). Reduce initial load time and memory usage.

title: Fix bd import JSONL to SQLite database bug
description: bd import reports 'Successfully imported' but 0 created/0 updated. Database remains empty. Error: 'readonly database' when clearing export_hashes. JSONL has 40 valid issues but they don't import to SQLite. Workaround: using no-db mode for CLI.

title: Add JSONL fallback support to VS Code extension
description: Extension currently requires SQLite database. Add support for reading directly from .beads/issues.jsonl when database is unavailable or when no-db mode is enabled. This will make the extension more resilient and support both storage backends.

title: Implement database migration system
description: Create migration framework for schema changes. Track migration version in database. Support forward and rollback migrations.

title: Testing & CI/CD Epic
description: Enhance test coverage, add integration tests, and establish CI/CD pipeline for automated quality checks.

title: Performance Optimization Epic
description: Optimize database queries, implement pagination, and improve rendering performance for large datasets.

title: Add custom column configuration
description: Allow users to show/hide columns, rename them, and customize which statuses map to which columns. Save configuration per workspace.

title: Security Hardening Epic
description: Comprehensive security review and hardening including input validation, XSS prevention, and secure coding practices.

title: Audit DOMPurify usage for XSS prevention
description: Verify all user input rendered in webview is properly sanitized with DOMPurify. Check markdown rendering, card content, and comment display.

title: Implement assignee autocomplete
description: Build autocomplete dropdown for assignee field using git contributor list or previous assignees from database.

title: Implement responsive design for narrow panels
description: Improve board layout when webview is narrow. Stack columns vertically or allow horizontal scroll. Test at various widths.

title: Improve accessibility (ARIA labels, keyboard nav)
description: Add proper ARIA labels to all interactive elements. Ensure full keyboard navigation. Test with screen readers. Add focus indicators.

title: Add SQL injection prevention audit
description: Review all SQL queries in beadsAdapter.ts. Verify parameterized queries are used everywhere and no string concatenation for SQL exists.

title: Implement issue export functionality
description: Add export to CSV, JSON, and Markdown formats. Include filtering options and field selection for exports.

title: Add ESLint configuration to project root
description: Create .eslintrc.json with TypeScript-specific rules and VS Code integration. Configure recommended rules for code quality.

title: Add database backup and restore functionality
description: Implement backup command to export DB with timestamp. Add restore from backup file. Include automatic backup before major operations.

title: Implement database integrity checks
description: Add validation commands: check foreign key constraints, verify orphaned records, detect corruption. Schedule periodic health checks.

title: Optimize database query performance
description: Add indexes to frequently queried columns. Profile slow queries and optimize joins in getBoard(). Consider query result caching.

title: Add integration tests for webview-extension communication
description: Test message protocol between webview and extension. Verify all message types handle success and error cases properly.

title: Add E2E tests with Playwright
description: Setup Playwright for end-to-end testing of the Kanban board UI. Test drag-and-drop, filtering, and CRUD operations.

title: Add bulk operations for issues
description: Implement multi-select for cards with bulk actions: change status, add labels, assign, delete. Add checkbox selection mode.

title: Add keyboard shortcuts
description: Implement shortcuts: n=new issue, r=refresh, f=focus search, /=filter, esc=close dialog, j/k=navigate cards. Show shortcut legend.

title: Feature Enhancements Epic
description: Add new features like bulk operations, export functionality, keyboard shortcuts, and enhanced search capabilities.

title: Improve card visual design
description: Enhance card styling: add priority color indicators, type icons, better label chips, due date badges. Make cards more scannable.
